long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your Company's Email Signatures

Create and manage a universal signature for all of your company's employees. Easily update and enhance tagline messages and make your daily emails an effective promotion vehicle.

Compatible with Google Apps and @gmail.com accounts.
